mapper.select: select t2.*, ak.name as attrKeyName from ( select av.* from (select rav.attr_value_id from room_attr_value rav where rav.room_id = #{id} and rav.is_deleted = 0) t1 left join attr_value av on t1.attr_value_id = av.id and av.is_deleted = 0 ) t2 left join attr_key ak on t2.attr_key_id = ak.id and ak.is_deleted = 0;
